name: basimilch-app
description: Web platform of the basimilch cooperative.

ARTICLES_OF_ASSOCIATION_URL.description: URL for the Articles Of Association. Used in the signup form.

BYPASS_REFERER_FILTER.description: Set this to FALSE to allow only signup requests coming from the url specified in DEFAULT_URL_DOMAIN_FOR_REFERER_FILTER.

DEFAULT_REDIRECT_URL_FOR_REFERER_FILTER.description: If the referer filter fails (see BYPASS_REFERER_FILTER), redirect to this URL.

EMAIL_CUSTOM_JOB_SIGNUP_MESSAGE.description: Custom message for the JobSignup confirmattion email.
EMAIL_CUSTOM_JOB_SIGNUP_MESSAGE.value: This is a custom message that can be edited in the EMAIL_CUSTOM_JOB_SIGNUP_MESSAGE env var.

INFO_GLOBAL_ANNOUNCEMENT.description: When set to something other than nil, it published it's content as an info alert at the top of the page.
INFO_GLOBAL_ANNOUNCEMENT.value: This app has been newly created. This message can be edited from the ENV variable EMAIL_CUSTOM_JOB_SIGNUP_MESSAGE.

REGULATIONS_URL.description: URL to the Terms and Conditions. Used in the signup form.

SHARE_CERTIFICATE_UNIT_PRICE.description: Price of each share certificate, in units of the currency used on the platform.

SUBSCRIPTION_NEXT_UPDATE_WEEK_NUMBER.description: Next open calendar week (KW) for the users to edit or cancel their subscription. Leave empty if no subscription change scheduled.
